station.name: CKUT 90.3 FM Montréal
station.longDesc: CKUT is a non-profit, campus-community radio station based at McGill University.  CKUT provides alternative music, news and spoken word programming to the city of Montreal and surrounding areas, 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.  Hear us at 90.3 MHz on the FM dial, 91.7 by cable, or listen on-line.  CKUT is composed of over 200 volunteers working with a staff of coordinators, not just to make creative and insightful radio programming, but also to manage the station. The station operates on a collective management system that includes volunteers in decision-making.
